title: "workflow version control"
format: pdf
author: Tammy Dang
---
Confirm R Version
```{r}
version$version.string
```

Update R Packages
```{r}
update.packages(ask = FALSE, checkBuilt = TRUE, repos='https://cran.us.r-project.org')
```

Always write with relative filepath names.

.gitignore file -- .gitignore: hidden file in folder structure, where git won't track the file. It won't push any of those changes to github.
